basics.name: Chase Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

education.courses: ICS Scripting or C/C++, ICS Algorithms, ICS Data Storage

work.summary: Teamwork focused retail store to provide guests with great customer service
highlights: Organize certain sections of the store according to the provided UNIQLO standard
Teamwork is a huge factor when working at UNIQLO, all associates have to help one another to keep the store up to standard

activities.summary: Offices lead students down the game development career path
highlights: Lead and guide students and club members down introductory game development elements
Schedule dates and meetings with members to discuss aspects of game design
Members take time to appreciate and understand cultural differences

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
